GalleryContent.Body: You can now apply colors to the geometry that you create and visualize all your analysis data using color coded elements within Dynamo. To access look out for Core > Display in library view. The canvas also comes with a better grid and the ability to visualize vectors.
You can now select multiple nodes and group them together. The shortcut for grouping is Ctrl + G. For switching between background preview and node view, use Ctrl + B.
All your working files are now safe even when Dynamo crashes. Look out for recovered files in the start page when you restart Dynamo after a crash.
You can now select multiple nodes at once to toggle on/off the geometry preview.
You can now drag items from the library. It helps you place nodes precisely on the first attempt.
